MAP:CHI01ObjectiveText: MISSION OBJECTIVE:\nDestroy the Nuclear Warhead Storage Facility
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder01: <Red Guard speaking>\n'General, we're all that's left of the assault force! We need to build a Command Center and get the radar up to receive new orders.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder02: <Red Guard speaking>\n'General, if we don't get our radar up we can't receive intelligence on the enemy's position. We need that radar.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder03: <'EVA' speaking>\n'General, you're alive!?! We thought we lost you when the bridge went down. Well, you're not out of danger yet, so let's get started.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder04: <'EVA' speaking>\n'First, you're going to need to finish your base. The barracks, reactor, and supply center are all essential to your survival, so finish constructing them immediately. I'll contact you again once your base is complete.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder05: <'EVA' speaking>\n'Excellent, your base is complete, except for a War Factory. We need to get you one now. There should be a surplus base--with a War Factory--here.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder06: <'EVA' speaking>\n'I don't know what condition the base is in, but it should allow you to build armored units to help your fight. Get there as soon as possible, General.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder07: <'EVA' speaking>\n'Now we know the GLA's reason for coming to Hong Kong: They're targeting key buildings around the city. Our main objective is to destroy all of the GLA's forces, but if we can also keep them from destroying those buildings, our leaders would be most grateful.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder08: <'EVA' speaking>\n'If you can keep your radar operating, I can track the Terrorists for you and give you their possible targets.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder09: <'EVA' speaking>\n'General, a Terrorist is leaving the Convention Center, and he's strapped with enough explosives to bring down a building! I'll mark the Terrorist in red on your radar. I'll mark his possible targets in yellow. Stop him before he reaches one of those targets!'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder10: <'EVA' speaking>\n'Another Terrorist has left the Convention Center! I'll mark his location in red. His possible targets are marked in yellow. Stop him, General.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder11: <'EVA' speaking>\n'General, this building is a Terrorist target--we must protect it!'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder12: <'EVA' speaking>\n'General, the Terrorists have taken over the Convention Center! You're going to have to destroy the Convention Center and the attached parking structures to stop the Terrorist threat.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder13: <'EVA' speaking>\n'Excellent, you've reached the surplus base. Hmm, it's not much to look at, but it will allow you to build tanks, and more War Factories, if you need.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder14: <'EVA' speaking>\n'The Terrorist threat is finished. Good work, General.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder15: <'EVA' speaking>\n'General, I've detected GLA armored units on the move. They didn't come from the Convention Center, so the GLA must have another base somewhere in Hong Kong. Find that base and destroy it!'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder16: <'EVA' speaking>\n'General, the GLA have brought their Toxin Tractors with them. You'll know them by the green ooze they spray. Keep your infantry units away from them and use your tanks to deal with this new threat.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder17: <'EVA' speaking>\n'Good work, General, you've destroyed the Toxin base. Now they shouldn't be able to build any more Toxin Tractors.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder18: <'EVA' speaking>\n'Wait, General, there is a large force up ahead. I'll call for an EMP strike to clear the area, standby.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder19: <'EVA' speaking>\n'That should give you a clear path to their base. Let's finish this, General.'
SCRIPT:CHI02AudioHolder20: <AutoFerry Capt. speaking>\n'Finally, the military is here! Those Terrorists are ruining my business! If you put your forces aboard I'll take you out to the Convention Center. You can sneak in the backdoor and catch them by surprise. Just hit the Transport button when you're ready.'
SCRIPT:CHI02Box01:
Use the DOZER to build the COMMAND CENTER
Once the COMMAND CENTER is complete,
select it and begin the RADAR upgrade
Once the upgrade is finished, a radar screen will appear
in the lower-left-hand corner of the Command Interface

SCRIPT:TrainingMove: Left click on units to select them. Selected units can be given commands. With a unit selected you can left click on the ground to give them a move command. Left click on enemy soldiers to order your selected unit to attack
SCRIPT:TrainingCommand: You have liberated a USA Command Center. Here you can use many of your special abilities. To choose technologies and special weapons click on the flashing General button
SCRIPT:TrainingExplor: The Fog of War around your units can be pushed back by moving into new and unexplored areas. The Fog shows you where you have explored and where you have not. Explore new areas to find enemy forces and resources to expand your army
SCRIPT:TrainingBarracks: You have liberated a USA Barracks. Buildings like this allow you to train new units. The Barracks trains soldiers. Left click on your new Barracks to see what soldiers you can train. Left click on a unit in the Barracks to spend the supplies to create that unit
SCRIPT:TrainingPilots: You have freed several Pilots. USA pilots are often veterans of many battles and they can enter your vehicles to provide their skills and experience to the crew of the vehicle. Vehicles with golden chevrons near them have experienced crews and are more effective in combat
SCRIPT:TrainingSupply: You have liberated a USA Supply Center. Supply Centers collect supplies, providing you with the resources to build new buildings and units. Each Supply Center automatically generates a single Chinook helicopter that will gather supplies for you
SCRIPT:TrainingDozer: You have liberated a USA Construction Dozer. Left click on your new Construction Dozer to see what buildings it can create. Select the War Factory and choose a location for it to be built. Once done creating the War Factory, the Dozer will be available for other construction projects
SCRIPT:TrainingUnits: Your new War Factory can be used to build vehicles like Crusader Tanks. Left click on a Crusader Tank to order it to be built. You can left click multiple times to order multiple tanks to be constructed
SCRIPT:TrainingPower: You have liberated a USA Cold Fusion Reactor. Reactors are used by American and Chinese forces to power their base. Your power bar indicates how much power your base has. If your base runs low on power base defenses may go off-line and your radar will go out
SCRIPT:TrainingAbilities: Some units have special abilities. Select a unit to see what special powers it has. Left click on the power to activate it. In the case of the USA Crusader Tank, each tank can build a single Battle Drone. Battle Drones are small robotic helpers that automatically engage enemies and repair their Crusader Tank in case it is damaged by enemy fire
SCRIPT:TrainingObjective: You have liberated an entire USA base and are now ready to carry the fight to the enemy. Each mission has mission objectives that you must follow in order to win the mission and to progress in your war against your enemies. Follow the mission objective to win the mission
SCRIPT:TrainingUrban: Civilian buildings can be occupied by soldiers. Order your soldiers to enter civilian buildings to get a defensive bonus. Civilian buildings occupied in this way are powerful strong-points for your troops and can be used to defend important routes into and out of your base
SCRIPT:TrainingTech: Civilian Objective Buildings can be captured by your Rangers. Holding these buildings will give you advantages against your enemies. Capture the Oil Derricks by selecting a Ranger, left clicking the capture button and then left clicking on the Oil Derrick itself. Oil Derricks provide you with additional resources as they pump oil
SCRIPT:TrainingCrate: Crates contain bonus items for your soldiers that will increase their abilities. Additional ammunition, armor and other items can be found in crates. Order your soldiers or vehicles to move onto a crate to open it and collect the contents

MAP:USA08ChinaHint: HINT:\nCapture the Chinese buildings\nBuild combined US and China forces to wipe out the GLA
MAP:USA08SCUDStormWarn: WARNING:\nThe GLA has constructed a SCUD Storm

MAP:TrainingGenerals: Left click on the generals button in the lower right corner of your screen to choose a new ability for your General. As you are promoted your General will gain access to new abilities. Some abilities will allow you to create new special units, while others will give you special powers that are used from your Command Center
MAP:TrainingSalvage: You have created a pile of salvage. Salvage is left behind whenever GLA vehicles destroy an enemy vehicle. GLA vehicles pick up salvage by moving over it. Salvage may grant weapon upgrades, money, or experience. Technicals, Quad Cannons and Marauders will be able to upgrade their weapons with salvage
MAP:TrainingUpgrade: Upgrades are bought at different structures in your base. They improve your units. Left click on the Barracks and then left click on Capture Building icon to upgrade your Rangers to be able to capture enemy buildings

TOOLTIP:AdvanceOptionsAccept: Accept the changes made to the Advance Display Options
TOOLTIP:AdvanceOptionsCancel: Exit the Advance Display Options Menu without making your changes
TOOLTIP:Shadows: Toggle showing shadows in game. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:BehindBuilding: Toggle showing units behind buildings. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:ShowProps: Toggle displaying game props. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:LowResSlider: Higher resolution textures can slow the game down
TOOLTIP:ParticleCapSlider: More particles can slow down the game
GUI:OlderReplayVersion: Loading may not display the replay properly, continue to load?
TOOLTIP:Shadows2D: Toggle showing 2D shadows in game. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:Shadows3D: Toggle showing 3D shadows in game. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:CloudShadows: Toggle showing cloud shadows on terrain. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:GroundLighting: Toggle showing detailed lighting on terrain. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:SmoothWater: Toggle smoothing of water borders. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:ExtraAnimations: Toggle showing optional animations like tree sway. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:NoDynamicLOD: Disable automatic detail adjustment (LOD). Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:UnlockMaxFPS: Allows frame rates above 30. Affects game speed so only recommended for benchmarks
TOOLTIP:TreeSway: Toggle tree animations. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:TankTreads: Toggle marks left by vehicles. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:WaterWaves: Toggle wave animations on shorelines. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:BuildupAnimations: Show additional animations during structure construction. Turn off for improved performance
GUI:AdvancedOptionsToggleOnOff: Toggle On/Off - Turn off to improve performance
GUI:PerformanceTestingMessage: Please wait while we test your system performance to determine optimal settings

GUI:InternetDisconnectionMenuBody1: One or more players have been disconnected from the game. If you choose to vote a person out of the game then click the VOTE button next to the respective player. When the timer counts down to 0 that person will be automatically removed from the game and the battle will continue
GUI:InternetDisconnectionMenuBody2: It is possible that the person is attempting to reconnect so you may choose to wait until this player's timer has elapsed. When the timer counts down to 0 that person will be automatically removed from the game and the battle will continue

CONTROLBAR:ChinaUpgradeHelixNapalmBomb: Enables this Helix to drop napalm bombs
CONTROLBAR:ChinaUpgradeHelixNukeBomb: Enables this Helix to drop nuke bombs
CONTROLBAR:TooltipUpgradeChinaIsotopeSta: Prevents most collateral radiation from harming friendly units when vehicles are destroyed
OBJECT:TechArtilleryPlatform: Artillery Platform -- Capture to bombard land based enemies

OBJECT:TechRepairBay: Repair Bay -- Capture to auto repair all vehicles

HELP:SentryDrone-01: HINT:\nThe Sentry Drone can detect camouflaged enemy units
HELP:SentryDrone-02: HINT:\nPurchase the Sentry Done gun from the Strategy Center
HELP:MicrowaveTank-01: HINT:\nThe Microwave Tank can disable structures
HELP:MicrowaveTank-02: HINT:\nThe Microwave Tank fries enemy infantry nearby
HELP:Avenger-01: HINT:\nThe Avenger laser can 'paint' enemy targets\nAllied units attack 'painted' targets with increased fire rate
HELP:Avenger-02: HINT:\nAvengers are support units that can also attack aircraft
HELP:FireBase-01: HINT:\nMan the Fire Base with Missile Defenders\nto provide both air and ground defense
HELP:SpectreGunship-01: HINT:\nSelect an area for the Spectre Gunship to attack,\nthen manually target enemies
HELP:LeafletDrop-01: HINT:\nUse the Leaflet Drop to disable enemy infantry
HELP:MOAB-01: HINT:\nMOABs are effective against vehicles in a wide area
HELP:Countermeasures-01: HINT:\nUpgrade to Countermeasures to help air units evade attacks
HELP:HellfireDrone-01: HINT:\nUpgrade your vehicles with Hellfire Drones\nto increase effectiveness against armored forces
HELP:ChemicalSuit-01: HINT:\nUtilize the Chemical Suit upgrade to protect infantry\nfrom deadly toxins and radiation
HELP:BunkerBuster-01: HINT:\nThe Stealth Bomber's Bunker Buster upgrade can damage garrisoned enemies
HELP:BunkerBuster-02: HINT:\nBunker Busters can kill units inside of Bunkers
HELP:SupplyLines-01: HINT:\nThe Supply Lines upgrade improves income
HELP:SupplyLines-02: HINT:\nUpgrade Supply Lines to increase the efficiency of Chinooks
HELP:ListeningOutpost-01: HINT:\nListening Outposts are stealthed and will detect camouflaged units
HELP:ListeningOutpost-02: HINT:\nListening Outposts have a very large sight radius
HELP:Helix-01: HINT:\nUpgrade a Helix with a Speaker Tower to repair and heal your nearby units
HELP:Helix-02: HINT:\nThe Helix can be upgraded to drop napalm bombs\nThese can be dropped on targets beneath the Helix
HELP:Helix-03: HINT:\nYou can upgrade a Helix with a Battle Bunker,\nSpeaker Tower, or Gattling Cannon
HELP:ECMTank-01: HINT:\nUse the ECM Tank to disrupt enemy missile and rocket fire
HELP:Frenzy-01: HINT:\nUse the Frenzy Generals Power to increase the firepower and armor of your units
HELP:InternetCenter-01: HINT:\nPlace Hackers in the Internet Center to increase money collection rate
HELP:InternetCenter-02: HINT:\nBuild an Internet Center and upgrade to Satellite Hack 1 and 2
HELP:SatelliteHack1-01: HINT:\nSatellite Hack 1 reveals all enemy Command Centers
HELP:SatelliteHack2-01: HINT:\nSatellite Hack 2 reveals all that enemy units can see
HELP:EMPMines-01: HINT:\nMines can be upgraded to Neutron Mines, which will disrupt enemy vehicles
HELP:NeutronShell-01: HINT:\nNeutron Shell attacks from the Nuke Cannon neutralize vehicles,\nallowing any infantry to capture them
HELP:CombatCycle-01: HINT:\nCombat Cycles can jump off of cliffs
HELP:CombatCycle-02: HINT:\nPlace a RPG Trooper on a Combat Cycle to allow it to fire rockets
HELP:CombatCycle-03: HINT:\nPlace a Terrorist on a Combat Cycle to produce a Suicide Bike
HELP:CombatCycle-04: HINT:\nJarmen Kell can snipe from a Combat Cycle
HELP:CombatCycle-05: HINT:\nWorkers can use Combat Cycles to travel quickly
HELP:Saboteur-01: HINT:\nThe Saboteur disrupts the abilities of enemy structures
HELP:Saboteur-02: HINT:\nDirect the Saboteur into an enemy Command Center\nto reset their Generals Powers timers
HELP:FakeStructures-01: HINT:\nBuild Fake Structures to fool your enemies
HELP:SneakAttack-01: HINT:\nUse Sneak Attack to instantly create a Tunnel Network anywhere you can see
HELP:GPSScramble-01: HINT:\nUse the GPS Scrambler Generals Power to camouflage friendly units
HELP:WorkerShoes-01: HINT:\nPurchase Worker Shoes to increase the speed Workers travel and collect resources
HELP:CamoNetting-01: HINT:\nCamo-Netting camouflages your Stinger Sites and Tunnel Networks
HELP:FortifiedStructures-01: HINT:\nFortified Structures are harder to destroy
HELP:BoobyTrap-01: HINT:\nBooby Traps will detonate when an enemy tries\nto garrison or capture the trapped structure
HELP:KingRaptor-01: HINT:\nKing Raptors carry extra ammo and have more armor
HELP:CombatChinooks-01: HINT:\nInfantry inside of a Combat Chinook can fire in flight
HELP:AuroraAlpha-01: HINT:\nThe Aurora Alpha is equipped with a small but devastating Fuel Air Bomb
HELP:MicrowavePatriot-01: HINT:\nThe EMP Patriot's Rockets are effective against both vehicles and infantry
HELP:AdvancedRods-01: HINT:\nAdvanced Rods provide more power than normal Control Rods
HELP:LaserTank-01: HINT:\nBuild extra Power Plants when using Laser Tanks\nThey cannot move or fire when power is low
HELP:LaserDefenseTurret-01: HINT:\nLaser Defense Turrets are strong but require extra power
HELP:AssaultTroopTransport-01: HINT:\nUnits can fire out of the Assault Troop Crawler
HELP:AttackOutpost-01: HINT:\nThe Attack Outpost can hold extra infantry and can detect stealthed units
HELP:FortifiedBunkers-01: HINT:\nThe Fortified Bunkers come with Mines and\nstronger armor and can hold extra infantry
HELP:Mini-Gunner-01: HINT:\nMini-Gunners carry a personal Gattling Gun
HELP:InfantryBlackLotus-01: HINT:\nYour Black Lotus units have improved abilities
HELP:InfantryBlackLotus-02: HINT:\nYou can build multiple Black Lotus units
HELP:InfantryHacker-01: HINT:\nThe Infantry General's Hacker hack money faster
HELP:ChineseParadrop-01: HINT:\nThe Chinese Paradrop parachutes Red Guard anywhere
HELP:EmperorTank-01: HINT:\nEmperor Tanks are the ultimate tank, effective against both vehicles and infantry
HELP:EmperorTank-02: HINT:\nThe Emperor Tank can be upgraded with a Gattling Cannon
HELP:EmperorTank-03: HINT:\nEmperor Tanks come equipped with Speaker Towers
HELP:TankDrop-01: HINT:\nThe Tank Drop allows you to parachute Battlemasters
HELP:TacticalNuke-01: HINT:\nYour Airfield can upgrade MiGs to carry Tactical Nukes
HELP:IsotopeStability-01: HINT:\nIsotope Stability will reduce the damage done to\nfriendly units when Nuclear Tanks are destroyed
HELP:AdvancedNuclearPower-01: HINT:\nAdvanced Nuclear Power Plants generate more power than normal Nuclear Plants
HELP:ToxinRebels-01: HINT:\nToxin Rebels shoot a stream of highly poisonous toxins
HELP:ToxinRebels-02: HINT:\nToxin Rebels are resistant to toxin attacks
HELP:ToxinRebels-03: HINT:\nUse Toxin Rebels to quickly clear out garrisoned structures
HELP:ToxinNetworks-01: HINT:\nToxin Networks fire streams of toxin from their cannons
HELP:ToxinTerrorists-01: HINT:\nToxin Terrorists explode in a cloud of toxin
HELP:ToxinTerrorists-02: HINT:\nUse Toxin Terrorists to attack large groups of infantry
HELP:AnthraxGamma-01: HINT:\nAnthrax Gamma increases the damage of all toxin attacks
HELP:AnthraxGamma-02: HINT:\nAnthrax Gamma is even more potent than Anthrax Beta
HELP:AdvancedTrap-01: HINT:\nAdvanced Traps are more powerful than normal Demo Traps
HELP:Demolitions-01: HINT:\nThe Demolitions ability enables all units to detonate

HELP:ReinforcementPad-01: HINT:\nCapture Reinforcement Pads to gain tank reinforcements
HELP:OilDerrick-01: HINT:\nCapture Oil Derricks to gain extra money
HELP:RepairBay-01: HINT:\nCapture Repair Bays to repair vehicles anywhere
HELP:ArtilleryPlatform-01: HINT:\nCapture Artillery Platforms to control key regions

MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_2: MISSION OBJECTIVE:\nDestroy US European Central Command in the Northeast
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_3: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nRescue the POWs and bring them back here\nThe Terror Cell will awaken to assist you against the US
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_4: HINT:\nMove the POWs to their village in the North and they will assist us
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_5: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nRemove the American threat to free the POWs from their captors
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_6: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nWe are ready to return to our village in the North
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_7: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nYou have rescued the POWs and returned them home\nThe Terror Cell will activate and begin to assault the US
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_8: HINT:\nCapture the remaining US structures and build a second base here
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_9: WARNING:\nTime is running out. Rescue the POWs
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_10: WARNING:\nWe must eliminate the enemy's Southern\nsupport base before they become too powerful
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_11: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nThe Terror Cell has been eliminated\nDo not let their deaths go unpunished
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_12: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nWe have beaten the enemy. Victory is ours
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_13: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nThe enemy is holding our brothers captive\nFree them and they will assist us against the US
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_14: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nIntel has reported that the POWs will be moved soon\nInfiltrate the US base to rescue them
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_15: HINT:\nUpgrade the China Command Center with Radar
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_16: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nProtect the GLA Terror Cell from US attacks and secure the area
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_17: HINT:\nBuild a GLA Command Center to use your Generals Powers
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_18: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nOur base is under attack
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_19: WARNING:\nThe POWs are being attacked. Defend them
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_20: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nThe POWs have all been killed\nThe Terror Cell joins us to avenge their deaths
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_21: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nThe enemy has spread out to secure more resources\nRemove them and use the resources for ourselves
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_22: HINT:\nTheir base is massive\nPerhaps Sneak Attacks will help us infiltrate it
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_23: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nWith the small base neutralized,\nwe can focus on the US European Central Command base
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_24:
We have a plan...
We shall move in and capture the Chinese Base
and use it to drive the USA out of Europe
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_25: The U.S. European Central Command base must fall
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_26: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nWe are being attacked from the East\nEliminate the southern US Support base
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_27: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nThe Terror Cell is being attacked by the US\nAssist them in repulsing our foes
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_28: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nRescue the POWs from the US support base\nbefore they are transferred to a new location
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_29: MISSION OBJECTIVE:\nDestroy US European Central Command in the Northeast
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_30: US Central Command, Stuttgart-Vaihingen, Germany\n'Sneak Attack'
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_31: US Central Command, Stuttgart-Vaihingen, Germany\n'Sneak Attack'
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_32: HINT:\nRemove the Americans from the area, then secure the supplies
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_33: HINT:\nFinish off the Central Command Base
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_34: HINT:\nCapture Oil Derricks and secure additional supplies\nCapture Artillery Platforms to control key areas
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_35: HINT:\nUpgrade the Cash Bounty Generals Power to increase income
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_36: HINT:\nUse the Sneak Attack ability to launch an attack against the US base
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_37: INCOMING TRANSMISSION:\nThe POWs have been moved away\nDespite our failure, the Terror Cell pledges their support
MD_GLA05-MilitaryBriefing:String_38: US Central Command, Stuttgart-Vaihingen, Germany\n'Sneak Attack'

TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Pos0: General Malcolm \"Ace\" Granger prefers to utilize the maximum airpower available to defeat his enemies
GUI:BioDefeatedEntry_Pos0: I guess It's time for me to go find a good airline job.
GUI:BioVictoriousEntry_Pos0: I win, you lose. What more is there to say?
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Pos1: Dr. Thrax prefers to mix deadly toxins to defeat his enemies
GUI:BioDefeatedEntry_Pos1: Perhaps I shouldn't have gotten my degree from a mail-order college.
GUI:BioVictoriousEntry_Pos1: You thought my toxins were ineffective and now look what has happened to you, General.
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Pos2: General Tsing Shi Tao prefers to utilize nuclear radiation to defeat his enemies
GUI:BioDefeatedEntry_Pos2: Another moment and I would have reduced you to dust.
GUI:BioVictoriousEntry_Pos2: You are lucky to have survived this battle intact. Challenge me again if you dare.
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Pos3: General Alexis Alexander prefers to build heavy base defenses and build superweapons to defeat her enemies
GUI:BioDefeatedEntry_Pos3: It's not fair! One more Super Weapon and I would have beaten you, General. Challenge me again, I dare you.
GUI:BioVictoriousEntry_Pos3: I told you you'd never beat my Super Weapons, General. Care to try again?
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Pos4: General Ta Hun Kwai prefers to construct well built tanks to defeat his enemies
GUI:BioDefeatedEntry_Pos4: You may have defeated my tanks, General, but the Tigress will crush you like an insect.
GUI:BioVictoriousEntry_Pos4: Tanks are the key to any victory... as you well know.
GUI:BioBirthplaceEntry_Pos5: Fort Union, Redwood Shores, California, USA
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Pos5: \"Pinpoint\" Townes prefers to utilize cutting edge laser technology to defeat his enemies
GUI:BioDefeatedEntry_Pos5: You defeated me, General, but I will scan your tactics and devise a superior strategy.
GUI:BioVictoriousEntry_Pos5: Your weaknesses became obvious when I scanned your tactics.
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Pos6: Prince Kassad prefers to use camouflage and covert ops to defeat his enemies
GUI:BioDefeatedEntry_Pos6: My men will not accept this defeat from their leader, General. You have signed my death warrant with your superior tactics...
GUI:BioVictoriousEntry_Pos6: Accept your bitter defeat and remove yourself from my sight, General
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Pos7: General \"Anvil\" Shin Fai prefers to enlist highly trained soldiers to defeat his enemies
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Pos8: General Rodall \"Demo\" Juhziz prefers to wire up powerful explosives to defeat his enemies
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Pos9: General \"Tigress\" Leiong Leang demands the use of all other technology to defeat her enemies
GUI:BioDefeatedEntry_Pos9: This has been an interesting contest. Perhaps you will challenge me again.
GUI:BioVictoriousEntry_Pos9: Improve your skills and challenge me again.
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_GLA: The Global Liberation Army prefers underhanded and sneaky tactics to defeat its enemies
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_China: China uses fire and overwhelming numbers to defeat its enemies
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_USA: The USA utilizes high tech weaponry and skill to defeat its enemies
TOOLTIP:BioStrategyLong_Random: This selection will randomly choose a faction
CREDITS:CameoPhotoshootStudio: Photos shot at Out West Studio
ACADEMY:BuildAllStructures: When you're on the battlefield it's important to utilize all the tools available to you, General. Make sure you build all the structures. You must maintain a strong military force
ACADEMY:BuildSupplyCenterEarlier: General, one of the most important functions of a strong leader is making sure that the soldiers have plenty of supplies. We suggest that you make sure to build a Supply Center or Stash whenever you begin a mission. Supplies bring you cash and cash brings you victory
ACADEMY:TryBuildingRadar: The Fog of War surrounds us all. One helpful way to see through the pea soup is via radar. Each faction is unique in how it obtains the eye in the sky. The USA Command Center automatically comes with radar, the Chinese Command Center must be upgraded and the GLA must build a Radar Van from its Arms Dealer
ACADEMY:BuildMorePeons: If you ask any other Generals they'll confirm a simple rule: The grunts make the army. In order to build your base you'll need to put your Dozers or Workers to work. These guys are key to your future success so don't forget them!
ACADEMY:TryCapturingStructures: General, sometimes it's easier to take what you want rather than work for it. If you build the \"Capture\" upgrade from your Barracks you'll be able to steal enemy structures. There are also Tech Buildings littered around the battlefield that can enhance your army even further
ACADEMY:SpendGeneralsPoints: With war come the spoils. Every time you destroy an enemy you'll earn your way toward more Generals Points. These can be spent by pressing the \"star\" button on the right side of the Command Bar. Simply open the Generals Points menu and spend your hard earned points on some new war toys
ACADEMY:TryUsingSuperweapons: What's the use of collecting Generals points if you don't use them? If you've purchased Generals Powers by using your points an icon will pop up on the right side of the screen. Simply press it and watch the fireworks begin. The more points you spend, the more powerful the power
ACADEMY:TryGarrisoningAStructure: Soldiers can be effective in the open, but are deadlier when garrisoned inside civilian buildings. Select your soldiers and send them into an empty structure. They'll be protected by the walls - unless a Flash Bang, Toxin Tractor or Dragon Tank comes their way
ACADEMY:IdleBuildingUnits: General, fielding and leading a great army should be your highest goal. Make sure you're building your fighting units by clicking on a Barracks, War Factory, Airfield, etc. and then clicking a respective picture in the bottom Command Bar. It will be money well spent and will help you achieve victory
ACADEMY:TryDragSelectingUnits: Manipulating your army is one of the trickiest things a General must learn. While you can click on each individual unit, it's usually faster to \"lasso\" a group of units. Simply click and drag the box around the units. They will now be in your control. If you click on another area the units will move to this spot
ACADEMY:ResearchUpgrades: A good General can make a lot of tanks, but a great General can make a lot of better tanks. Almost every unit has some form of upgrade. It's often best to spend your money on improving what you already have
ACADEMY:RanOutOfPower: While the GLA has no need for power, China and the USA eat it up like popcorn. Running on low power puts your production and defenses at a disadvantage. Make sure to build a Cold Fusion Reactor or a Nuclear Reactor for maximum output. Without power you have no chance in this war
ACADEMY:BuildMoreGatherers: General, make sure you're building plenty of Workers, Supply Trucks or Chinooks to keep your income flowing. You can purchase extra gatherers by clicking on the resource gatherer's picture in the Supply Center or Stash. Don't be shy about maximizing your resource potential
ACADEMY:BuildAHero: Jarmen Kell, Col. Burton and Black Lotus can be invaluable to your strategy. These heroes can turn the tide of a battle and are invisible to the enemy. To locate your hero on the radar, look for the cross hair icon. Though you can only build one at a time don't underestimate their importance
ACADEMY:PickStrategyCenterPlan: The US Strategy Center is a very helpful structure. You should remember to choose the strategy that best fits your gameplan. Search & Destroy, Bombardment and Hold the Line are all excellent ways to give you the edge you need. Along with these overall strategies you can purchase many upgrades from this building
ACADEMY:UseTunnelNetwork: When it comes to the GLA sneaking around the battlefield is their calling card. Tunnel Networks offer defense capabilities but they also allow the player to move around quickly. Simply build a few Tunnel Networks and send your units inside. Click on the structure and you can expel them from any other Tunnel Network anywhere on the map. They are key to the overall GLA strategy
ACADEMY:UseControlGroups: Managing a large army can be a bit unruly sometimes. One way to manage lots of units easily is by creating a \"control group\". Simply select the group of units in question and press \"Ctrl\" & a number at the same time. Now anytime you press this number, the group of units will be selected. Tap the number twice quickly and the camera view will center over the group
ACADEMY:UseSecondaryIncomeMethods: General, acquiring supplies later in a mission can be difficult. Each faction has a unique way to gain funds during long battles. China can build Hackers and an Internet Center. You can direct the Hackers to hack the internet for funds anywhere or just send them inside Internet Center to gain money even quicker. The GLA depends on the Black Market and the USA relies on the Supply Drop. If you don't plan ahead you may have shortages
ACADEMY:ClearBuildings: Garrisoned buildings can be tough to handle - unless you know some tricks. Upgrade your US Rangers with Flash Bangs, build GLA Toxin Tractors or Chinese Dragon Tanks to quickly clear out these strong points. The USA can also upgrade to the Bunker Buster to even clear out Tunnel Networks!
ACADEMY:PickUpSalvage: The GLA is a sneaky bunch but they're also resourceful. Whenever the GLA units destroy another vehicle a salvage bonus is left behind. Roll over the salvaged parts to upgrade your units, gain veterancy or get some extra cash. Salvage can make a big difference in a long fight so don't leave it just lying around
ACADEMY:UseGuardAbility: Sometimes it's important that units stay put and guard a particular area. Simply select the unit and press the \"shield\" button or \"G\" key and then select the area to be guarded. The unit will attack any enemies that enter its guard radius
ACADEMY:MultipleSupplyCenters: Supplies are the name of the game, General. They can be gathered at Supply Docks littered around the battlefield. While one dock may be enough early on, it's usually best to branch out and find a few more during a mission. You'll need to build a Supply Center or Stash close to the Supply Dock to ensure efficient collection
ACADEMY:GarrionVehicle: Some units may enter or steal other vehicles. Stealing vehicles with Hijackers or Terrorists can allow you to sneak into enemy territory
ACADEMY:UseSelectionHotkeys: General, hotkeys are a great way to enhance your control of your forces. \"E\" will select all of the same unit types on the view screen. If you tap \"E\" twice quickly it will select all the same type across the entire battlefield. \"Q\" will select all your combat units on the map. \"W\" will select all your air units on the map. Give them a try, they'll help you out
ACADEMY:AlternateMouseInterface: One new addition is the \"Alternate Mouse Interface\" option located in the Options Menu. If you are used to commanding armies using right click as your action button then this may help you get a better handle on your army
ACADEMY:DoubleClickAttackMoveGuard: General, we have created a new way to direct your army. Simply select your units and double click the destination area. Your units will attack-move to the spot and then guard it. You may enable this through the options menu
ACADEMY:BuildBarracksSooner: In order to create a well balanced force you must build a Barracks earlier in the mission. Infantry can make or break your gameplan so it's best not to forget them
ACADEMY:BuildWarFactorySooner: While infantry and airpower can be great assets nothing quite beats a good tank. Be sure to build a War Factory or Arms Dealer earlier in the mission
ACADEMY:BuildTechStructureSooner: For the advanced weaponry there is no replacement for a Strategy Center, Propaganda Center or Palace. Don't forget to build one a bit earlier in missions to ensure success
ACADEMY:NoIncome: General, it's vital to your success that your income flow continues throughout the mission. Too many gaps lead to losing your edge. Make sure you're keeping the supplies rolling in consistently
ACADEMY:ClearMines: Demo Traps and mines can really be the start of a bad day. These sneaky tactics can be combated by using Dozers or Workers to clear these dangerous areas out
ACADEMY:UnmannedVehicles: General, some units can snipe or remove enemy drivers of vehicles. When this occurs the vehicles become neutral and can be \"borrowed\" from the enemy. Feel free to go for a ride at your enemy's expense
ACADEMY:DisguisedUnits: Some units can disguise themselves as other units. There is nothing quite as satisfying as rolling a GLA Bomb Truck into an enemy base undetected and causing lots of havoc. Make sure to use this key tactic to further your battle plan
ACADEMY:StealthUpgrade: Some structures can be upgraded to camouflage, like the GLA Tunnel Network or Stinger Site. These will be invisible to the enemy until it's too late. Surprise!
ACADEMY:Firestorm: China has the unique ability to create a Firestorm when multiple MiGs or Inferno Cannons target a single enemy or area. Make sure to coordinate your attacks for maximum effect
TOOLTIP:HeatEffects: Toggle showing heat distortion effects. Turn off for improved performance
TOOLTIP:WeatherEffects: Toggle showing weather effects such as snow. Turn off for improved performance

DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf01Subtitle: *General, the GLA managed to defeat the US forces in this area. We launched a devastating counter attack, but like roaches they are still alive
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf02Subtitle: *Even now the GLA survivors are rebuilding
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf03Subtitle: *To finally eliminate the GLA we must send in our forces and root them out of every dark corner in which they hide
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf04Subtitle: *General, our new Listening Outposts are stationed in the area. They are at your disposal
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xBrf05Subtitle: *The Listening Outpost itself is unarmed, however its passengers can fire on enemies that venture too close. You will find its long sight range and stealth ability greatly enhances battlefield awareness
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat01Subtitle: *No GLA will slip past our garrison
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat02Subtitle: *Toxin Tractors! They're trying to poison us all... we need support!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat03Subtitle: *Look... Oil Derricks... should we capture them?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat04Subtitle: *GLA in your home? Apply a little fire... no more GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat05Subtitle: *The GLA are rebuilding over there... stand ready to attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xChat06Subtitle: *We will win this day... everyone advance...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01aSubtitle: *I did not think the United States would be defeated so easily
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01bSubtitle: *I do not understand why the United States has allowed this to happen
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01cSubtitle: *This can not be allowed to stand. China will make things right
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin01dSubtitle: *The GLA's treacherous use of our resources against the Americans has caused great embarrassment to China. They must pay for their insolence
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin02Subtitle: *The missiles are prepared and ready for launch... final countdown started
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin04Subtitle: *They believe they have won the day, but they celebrate too soon
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin05Subtitle: *It is pretty when used for the right reasons...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin06Subtitle: *GLA survivors are running to town for cover... they must be stopped!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin07Subtitle: *We are in position... bomb bay doors open...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xCin08Subtitle: *We have spotted survivors. Ground assault will be necessary
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO01Subtitle: *General, our former base in the region was overrun by the GLA. You will need to construct a new base before you can engage the enemy
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO02Subtitle: *May I suggest that you garrison several of the nearby buildings to defend our base
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO03Subtitle: *General, the GLA has garrisoned several buildings throughout the town. Perhaps you could use a Dragon tank to clear out those garrisons
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO04Subtitle: *General, the GLA is moving Toxin Tractors towards our garrisoned buildings. If those tractors attack those buildings, everyone inside will be eliminated
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO05Subtitle: *The GLA are using these Oil Derricks to fund their forces. One of our Red Guard could capture those derricks. The proceeds would help defeat the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO06Subtitle: *General, is it wise to destroy these Oil Derricks? They would provide valuable resources for us. One of our Red Guard could capture them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO07Subtitle: *You have caught them off-guard, General. One of your Red Guard could capture their buildings before they are able to respond
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO08Subtitle: *Now that you have re-established our base of operations, it is time to root out all remaining GLA forces in the area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI01xXO09Subtitle: *Congratulations, General. You have freed the town of all GLA forces. Once you have wiped out their final base, your mission will be complete
DIALOGEVENT:MisChi02Lin13Subtitle: *The Terrorist threat is finished. Good work, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf01Subtitle: *General, the GLA are attempting to steal the nuclear warheads stored at this facility
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf01aSubtitle: *General, the GLA are attempting to destroy our main nuclear power plant
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf02Subtitle: *Our brave soldiers held off their attack but at great cost and the GLA is still out there
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf03Subtitle: *You must hold off the GLA and insure that every one of our Bunkers is protected
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf03aSubtitle: *You must hold off the GLA to insure that the facility is not destroyed
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf04Subtitle: *We have several new technologies that should be of great benefit to your mission, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf05Subtitle: *Our Nuclear Cannons are now upgraded to fire neutron shells. These new shells effectively eliminate soldiers and vehicle drivers. Once the radiation has cleared, one of our infantrymen can then capture the surviving vehicles
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf06Subtitle: *Our buildings can now upgrade to Neutron mines. While still effective against infantry, they will also temporarily incapacitate enemy vehicles
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf07aSubtitle: *General, your reinforcements will arrive in 15 minutes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf07bSubtitle: *General, your reinforcements will arrive in 10 minutes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xBrf07cSubtitle: *General, your reinforcements will arrive in 5 minutes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat01Subtitle: *Enemy forces sighted. We will hold them back
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat02Subtitle: *We're taking fire on the right flank... support is needed here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat03Subtitle: *They are behind us... direct all fire to the south!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat04Subtitle: *GLA base in range... all teams ready to attack, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat05Subtitle: *Enemy buildings on that ridge. Give the word, General, and we will roll over them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat06Subtitle: *Watch those RPG Troopers! We need help!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat07Subtitle: *General, we are over the target area now and have commenced bombing
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat08Subtitle: *Rolling out the carpet... of bombs. Heheh
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat09Subtitle: *Enemy air defenses are thick here... we are taking heavy damage
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat10Subtitle: *Stinger sites have locked onto us... we are in trouble!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat11Subtitle: *Stop that Rebel, he's trying to capture our bunker!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat12Subtitle: *It isn't a Battlemaster, but it will have to do
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat16Subtitle: *Now we will show them how to attack a base!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat17Subtitle: *Reinforcements! We are glad to see you!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xChat18Subtitle: *We are ready for your orders, General. Where do you need us?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01Subtitle: *We must be on our guard. Reports say the GLA might attack as revenge for our entering the war
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01aSubtitle: *I don't feel safe guarding this nuclear plant
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01bSubtitle: *Yah. I wish I had joined up with the air force instead
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01dSubtitle: *Surely after our recent victory they would not dare to attack us here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin01cSubtitle: *Their food is much better. And they get to wear those fancy helmets
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin04aSubtitle: *Another wave! They've got bomb trucks and terrorists! We need reinforcements!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin04bSubtitle: *Another wave! They're using suicide tactics! Where are those reinforcements?!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin06Subtitle: *They're trying to get to the storage bunkers! Protect them at all costs!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin06aSubtitle: *They're trying to get to the main reactor! Protect it at all costs!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin07Subtitle: *The Command Center... they got the Command Center
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin09Subtitle: *Not much left. We're going to need reinforcements
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xCin10Subtitle: *The message got through, but we'll have to hold until they get here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO02Subtitle: *General, GLA forces are attacking the bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO02aSubtitle: *General, GLA forces are attacking the nuclear plant!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO03Subtitle: *The GLA is attempting to capture one of our bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO04Subtitle: *General, this bunker is badly damaged. May I suggest it be repaired before another GLA attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO04aSubtitle: *General, our nuclear plant is badly damaged. May I suggest it be repaired before another GLA attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO05Subtitle: *General, that last attack severely weakened several bunkers. If one of them is destroyed, the GLA will win this encounter
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO05aSubtitle: *General, that last attack severely weakened the nuclear plant. If it is destroyed, we will fail our mission!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO06Subtitle: *Warning... GLA forces moving towards the bunkers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO06aSubtitle: *Warning... GLA forces are moving towards the power plant!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO07Subtitle: *General, I've made contact with one of our spy outposts. They are under GLA attack. If we can rescue them, I can patch into their system and we will be able to call in carpet bombers
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO08Subtitle: *General, if you can secure that spy outpost, it will allow you to direct carpet bombing runs on the GLA forces
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI02xXO09Subtitle: *General, now that our reinforcements have arrived it is time to eliminate the GLA from this area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf01Subtitle: *Greetings, General. Now that we have thwarted the GLA's counterattack, it is time to press our advantage!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf02Subtitle: *We must liberate this town from the GLA's clutches
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf03Subtitle: *There is a very heavily defended GLA base north of the river. We must destroy it, but it will not be an easy task
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf04Subtitle: *Our operations have attracted much attention from the rest of the world, and we will be watched closely. The longer this battle goes on, the lower our International Opinion will fall
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf05Subtitle: *Damage to civilian property must be avoided. Our operation must be precise, and swift. Destruction of GLA forces will cause International Opinion to rise, in our favor
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf09Subtitle: *If our International Opinion becomes high enough, the people of the town might join our cause
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xBrf10Subtitle: *It will then be easy to annihilate the GLA's defenses
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat01Subtitle: *They must have a camouflaged Tunnel Network near here...
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat05Subtitle: *They are coming from the far side of the lake
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat06Subtitle: *Their troops must be hidden in the forest
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat12Subtitle: *The people are too afraid to come out from their homes
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xChat13Subtitle: *We must free them from this oppression!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO10Subtitle: *General. Destroying the GLA statues will be critical to increasing our International Opinion and will boost support of our efforts amongst the population
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO11Subtitle: *They have dispatched a Toxic Tractor to clear our garrisonned structures!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO12Subtitle: *Our Dragon Tanks will be a high priority target... guard them well
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO13Subtitle: *Well done, sir. The destruction of the statue has caused world opinion to rise
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO16Subtitle: *Do not let them destroy the buildings!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO17Subtitle: *Use the Neutron Shell to clear buildings without damaging them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO18Subtitle: *Beware! Their defensive structures are hidden with camo-netting
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO19Subtitle: *General, the GLA have the city well-defended. We need to clear them out
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO20Subtitle: *You're making good progress, General. Much of the city is now free of GLA control
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO21Subtitle: *Sir! The city is rising up against our foes!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO22Subtitle: *General, we must clear the GLA from this area!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI03xXO23Subtitle: *Our International Opinion is high. Great work!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat01Subtitle: *They have almost escaped! We must stop them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat010Subtitle: *They are skirting the lake. Intercept them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat012Subtitle: *We have stopped the first wave of GLA!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat013Subtitle: *Again we have put them in their place!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat014Subtitle: *No one can stand to the might of China!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat018Subtitle: *We will banish them from the skies!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat03Subtitle: *We cannot let them get past that hill
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat04Subtitle: *They will surely pass by here. We should defend this area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat15Subtitle: *Our forces are in position. We are ready for anything
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xChat16Subtitle: *They are stronger than we thought. We need air support. Send in the Helix now!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO01Subtitle: *The GLA is sending forth another wave!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO02Subtitle: *This wave is retreating towards the north
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO04Subtitle: *This wave is retreating to the east
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO05Subtitle: *The European Union is extremely pleased with our performance, General. We need to stay aggressive and eliminate the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO07Subtitle: *General, they have a scud storm! We must spread out our troops to deny them a target!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO09Subtitle: *The GLA have no honor! They have decimated the village to clear a path!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO10Subtitle: *We should assemble a base to secure this region
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO11Subtitle: *Our Helix is the Overlord of the skies. Build more to help us control the area
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO12Subtitle: *Sir, I recommend placing Listening Outposts at key locations
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO13Subtitle: *Current Intel reports that the GLA are retreating towards this location. We will make our stand here. Do not permit any GLA units to leave this area. Our new Helix Helicopter should assure your success. The appearance of our forces from the south will signal the completion of your main objective
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO14Subtitle: *Current Intel reports that the GLA are retreating towards this location. We will make our stand here. Do not permit any GLA units to leave this area. If too many of them escape, our mission will be a failure. Our new Helix Helicopter should assure your success. The appearance of our forces from the south will signal the completion of your main objective
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO15Subtitle: *A wave of GLA is approaching from the west
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO16Subtitle: *There is a wave of GLA approaching from the south
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO17Subtitle: *GLA forces have been spotted approaching from the southwest
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO19Subtitle: *A wave of GLA forces are approaching from the southwest
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO21Subtitle: *Excellent work, sir. Intel confirms that you have destroyed the entire wave
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO22Subtitle: *The enemy is about to breach our defenses
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO24Subtitle: *Our defenses have been breached, General, we have failed the mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO25Subtitle: *General, our forces from the south have arrived. Our mission was a success
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO26Subtitle: *General, enemy forces are dangerously close to making their escape. We must deal with them quickly!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO27Subtitle: *GLA forces have been detected fleeing through this location. Move into defensive positions and await enemy contact
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO28Subtitle: *General, Wave 1 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO29Subtitle: *General, Wave 2 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO30Subtitle: *General, Wave 3 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO31Subtitle: *General, Wave 4 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO32Subtitle: *General, Wave 5 of the enemies retreat has been detected entering the area and intel has them moving along the path shown on the your radar
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO33Subtitle: *Our forces have arrived from the south. You have been successful in preventing the enemy retreat. Good job General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI04xXO34Subtitle: *General, the enemy forces have escaped to the North. We have failed the mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisChi05OfficerC01Subtitle: *It's time we corrected our mistake. Kill them all!
DIALOGEVENT:MisChi05OfficerC02Subtitle: *Let us flush these rats from their holes. Death to the cowards!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf01Subtitle: *Thanks to your remarkable efforts in Halberstadt the GLA are all but finished. US intel has located the last GLA stronghold outside of Hamburg. Unfortunately we were too late to help the Americans in this area and the GLA captured their base. Build your forces and destroy both the GLA and US bases
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf02Subtitle: *The GLA have captured an old US base in the region and are building up. Your Final Objective is to Destroy both the US and GLA bases
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf03Subtitle: *The GLA have increased their stealth abilities, General. They can now stealth just about anything. We'll need to stay alert
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf04Subtitle: *Use your Listening Outposts to detect stealthed units
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xBrf05Subtitle: *General, I suggest you first concentrate your attack on the US base. We need to take out their Particle Cannons
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xChat01Subtitle: *It feels like we are on an Easter Egg hunt, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin01Subtitle: *Corporal! Any sign of the Chinese yet?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin02Subtitle: *No sir, the last message received was at 02:00... nothing since
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin03Subtitle: *Well, I hope they get here soon. Our intel points to a full-scale GLA attack
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin07Subtitle: *Our base has been breached... all units to your stations! Where are those Chinese we were promised!?
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin08Subtitle: *Fox in the hole! Fox in the hole!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xCin10Subtitle: *They're capturing our buildings! We can't hold! All units, fall back! Repeat, fall back!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO01Subtitle: *That's it! Power to the US base is down! Finish them quickly before they can rebuild!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO02Subtitle: *Well done, General. The enemy can no longer produce US units
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO03Subtitle: *Well done, General. The enemy can no longer produce GLA units
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO04Subtitle: *Well done, General. The US base has been neutralized. Destroy the GLA base to finish this battle
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO05Subtitle: *Well done, General. The GLA base has been neutralized. Destroy the US base to finish this battle
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO06Subtitle: *We must finish what the US was not able to do. The GLA must fall and the world will be at peace
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO07Subtitle: *If we are able to defeat the GLA and save Europe from its clutches then there are great rewards to be had
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO08Subtitle: *General, you will take your place among China's finest heroes. The GLA has fallen and China is the shining beacon in a new world. Take you place of honor and bask in the glory that is China
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO09Subtitle: *General, the enemy has improved their stealth ability, but they do not appear to be using tanks
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO10Subtitle: *General, the GLA commander is lacking tanks. Perhaps we can overwhelm him with our forces
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO11Subtitle: *General, we are losing vehicles to Jarmen Kell. You must track him down if we are to stand a chance
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO12Subtitle: *General, the enemy is using HIJACKERS! We need to stop them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO13Subtitle: *General, the enemy has positioned SNIPERs in the local villages. We must clear them out
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO14Subtitle: *General, we are losing troops to the enemy's Quad Cannons, we need heavy armor out here
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO15Subtitle: *General, current intel suggests Jarmen Kell may be holed up in this small village
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO16Subtitle: *General, the enemy's base seems to be on the other side of this river. Perhaps we can lock him in by positioning forces near the bridges
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO17Subtitle: *General, we have many driverless vehicles in the field... send units to recapture them
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO18Subtitle: *Sir! We have detected Battle buses in sector C. We should deal with them before they can reach our base
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO19Subtitle: *General, the enemy has slipped units into our base! We should improve our defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO20Subtitle: *General, the enemy has infiltrated our base!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO21Subtitle: *General! Taking out the American Command Center will put a stop to his heavy Air support
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO22Subtitle: *General, we need to get our INTERNET CENTER built as quickly as possible. It will help us locate enemy positions
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO23Subtitle: *General, the enemy has left his Flank unguarded! Now is our chance to counter attack!
DIALOGEVENT:MisCHI05xXO24Subtitle: *General, the Americans have superior stealth detection technology. Perhaps you should capture this base instead of destroying it
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01Scorpion108Subtitle: *We have found a secret way. It's poorly guarded
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat02Subtitle: *Enemy position spotted! We must find a way past them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat04Subtitle: *American Sentry Drones! We must destroy them quickly before they sound the alarm!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat05Subtitle: *Look at them scramble! Our attack was a complete surprise!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat06Subtitle: *American attackers closing in! We must hold our position, General!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xChat07Subtitle: *Our surprise was complete! All units, concentrate on their power plants!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin01Subtitle: *Patrol to base: Target has been located and we are in pursuit
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin02Subtitle: *Be advised, the bombing campaign has already begun. Be careful, Patrol
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin03Subtitle: *Roger that, base. I'm on the right
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin08Subtitle: *Base! Charlie three is down! Repeat: Charlie three is down!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin09Subtitle: *Continue pursuit, Charlie two! This is our best shot at him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin12Subtitle: *Heh heh. General, we've made our escape.and are headed for the rendevouz point. The GLA shall rise again
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin14Subtitle: *This is scout team. We detect no enemy presence. Wait...
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xCin16Subtitle: *Sentry Drones! These Americans are most clever. Their drones are hidden when they are still. You must proceed with caution, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen01Subtitle: *The Americans have surrounded our stronghold with military checkpoints. You must clear the way
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen02Subtitle: *General, you must help our true leader escape, so that the GLA can live on
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen03Subtitle: *Dr. Thrax may have died for the cause but he was inconsequential. If our brother escapes the US will not have seen the last of the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen04Subtitle: *General. The Fire Base defenses around this American position are too strong. We should avoid a direct confrontation and find another way into the base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen05Subtitle: *Hold you forces back, General. We are sending in a team to scout the other side of the bridge. They will report back on enemy positions
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen06Subtitle: *My General. One of our Quick Strike teams has managed to elude their American pursuers, and have agreed to aid us in our mission. Their rocket pods should prove most useful against enemy armor
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen07Subtitle: *We have discovered one of our demolitions teams. They will help us to clear a path by destroying the outlying US support bases
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen08Subtitle: *General. We must secure the airfield before the transport plane arrives. The survival of the GLA depends on your success
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen09Subtitle: *Our Combat Cycles are very versatile. They enhance the abilities of our loyal infantry, and are able to travel over rough terrain. They are even able to survive a jump off cliffs. Use them to bypass American strong-points and attack their vulnerable sides
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen10Subtitle: *General! The Americans have sent a second group of pursuers to capture our leader. Protect him at all costs!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen11Subtitle: *General, this hidden base can provide us with the resources we need to push past the American siege and reach the airfield
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen12Subtitle: *General, our leader is under attack! He must not fall to the Americans!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen13Subtitle: *General, your forces are moving too far ahead of our leader. Remember that he must reach the airfield if our cause is to survive
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen14Subtitle: *Another American base. It must be eliminated. Be wary of their Fire Bases, sir
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen15Subtitle: *We are within reach of the airfield, General. Destroy the American forces and secure the area that we may fly our leader to safety
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen16Subtitle: *Well done, General. With you in command, we can not fail
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen17Subtitle: *We have reached the airfield, sir. Make sure our leader is ready and waiting at the air strip when his plane arrives
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen18Subtitle: *Our plane is on approach, General! Just hold your position for a little longer. Our leader must survive to board that plane!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen19Subtitle: *The plane has arrived. Load our leader in so that we may fly him to safety and regroup
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen20Subtitle: *The plane is waiting for our leader to board. Make haste and bring him in, General. Our forces cannot hold out indefinitely against the Americans
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen21Subtitle: *Our operative, Jarmen Kell, has been harassing the American supply lines. He will be of great help to our mission, General
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen22Subtitle: *Excellent work, General. We will show the Americans that we still have the power to resist them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen23Subtitle: *We have discovered an advance scout force, General. They have offered to aid us with our mission
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen24Subtitle: *General! Take out the American power plants to shut down their base defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA01xKen25Subtitle: *Our forces have been weakened, General. We must choose our battles more wisely
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02Chatter04Subtitle: *We are here and ready for your command
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xChat02Subtitle: *The resistance is too strong, there must be another way
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xChat03Subtitle: *The Prince must be stopped. The GLA must not fall to him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xChat07Subtitle: *We must rebuild our Arms Dealer quickly
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin01Subtitle: *This is Recon 1 to base. I am finishing my patrol. Sector is clear
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin02Subtitle: *This is base. Are you certain, Recon 1? We've had reports of troop movements linked to Prince Kassad
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin03Subtitle: *I am most certain. I haven't seen anything but dust and shrubs for hours now. Returning to base after this
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin05Subtitle: *Recon 1 to base! Enemy contact! Repeat, enemy contact!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin08Subtitle: *Recon 1, what is your status? Recon 1! Report!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin09Subtitle: *Once Prince Kassad is removed the GLA will be under our control. Then vengeance will be ours and the American infidels will burn
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xCin10Subtitle: *Prince Kassad is beginning to take control wherever he can. We must put an end to his vie for power
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen01Subtitle: *General, our resources are running low -- we must find a new source of supplies!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen02Subtitle: *Kassad is attempting to capture nearby resources! We must not let him take what is rightfully ours!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen03Subtitle: *We must reunite the GLA under one leader!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen04Subtitle: *Beware! Kassad has launched a sneak attack against us!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen05Subtitle: *We have much bigger plans than that rat Kassad. The world will quake as we unleash the fury of the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen06Subtitle: *We have acquired GPS Scramble technology! Now we can use Kassad's tricks against him!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen07Subtitle: *Excellent, General! We have secured the Sneak Attack ability!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen09Subtitle: *If we can capture the enemy Command Center we can use their technology against them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen10Subtitle: *General, we must capture their Command Center and use their knowledge to progress towards our goal of uniting the GLA under one flag
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen11Subtitle: *We are running low on resources. We must capture some oil derricks
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen12Subtitle: *Our enemy is attacking our Oil Supply! They must be stopped!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen13Subtitle: *Use the GPS scramble to sneak past the enemy defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen14Subtitle: *The GPS Scramble will not work here, there are too many Stinger Sites.We will need to use a different tactic
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen15Subtitle: *Perhaps we can find an unguarded area to use our new Sneak Attack ability
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen16Subtitle: *Do not destroy the Command Center. We need to capture the structure and keep it intact
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen17Subtitle: *Their knowledge must be stolen. We need to use their advanced tactics to defeat them!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen18Subtitle: *General, be wary of snipers -- Kassad loves to use them
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen19Subtitle: *This bridge is heavily defended. We will need assistance in getting across it
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen20Subtitle: *Capture the enemy Command Center to the North!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen21Subtitle: *Capture the enemy Command Center to the West!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen22Subtitle: *General, if we capture this cannon, we can use it against Kassad's forces!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen23Subtitle: *If we capture the Command Center, we can use their abilities to turn the tide of this battle
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen24Subtitle: *Prince Kassad is no more. The GLA are once again united against our enemies!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen25Subtitle: *Now that we have GPS scramble, we can move unseen past Kassad's bridge defenses!
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen26Subtitle: *The traitor has fortified himself on this hilltop and cut all other means of access. Sneak Attack is the only way we have to strike at his main base
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen27Subtitle: *General, this area is being controlled by Prince Kassad. He has turned his back on his brethren and will not aid us in our cause against the infidels
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen28Subtitle: *Kassad is a master of stealth, hiding his forces in plain sight. He refuses to share his knowledge with us, so we will take it from him
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen29Subtitle: *A GLA splinter cell commanded by Prince Kassad is controlling this area. Kassad refuses to let us use his abilities for the good of the GLA
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen30Subtitle: *Kassad is a master of stealth, relying on several techniques to surprise and attack his enemies
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen31Subtitle: *GPS scramble gives him the power to have any unit strike unseen against an enemy
DIALOGEVENT:MisGLA02xKen32Subtitle: *Tunnel sneak attacks offer further tactical advantages...
